oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Deathtrap" program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: arts; entertainment; theater; Theatre Memphis; 1980s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of the program from Theatre Memphis' 1983 production of "Deathtrap." Written by: Ira Levin. Director: Sherwood Lohrey. Cast: David Bailey, Anastasia Herin, Kevin Wilson, Jean Austin, Chris Schadrack. April 19 through May 8, 1983.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white program cover, 5.5 x 8.5 in.
